rock.paper: Paper covers Rock! Ouch! You lose!
rock.spock: Spock vaporizes Rock! Sorry bout it. You lose!

paper.rock: Paper covers Rock! Smooth. You win!
paper.scissors: Scissors cut your Paper! You lose
paper.lizard: Your Paper is being digested by the Lizard! You lose!

scissors.lizard: Your Scissors left the Lizard's head rolling! You win!
scissors.paper: Your Scissors sliced through the competition, defeating Paper! You win!
scissors.rock: The Rock crumpled your paper! You lose!
scissors.spock: Spock angrily smashes your Scissors! You lose!

spock.scissors: Spock sets phaser to 'Destroy Office Supplies' and defeats Scissors! You win!
spock.lizard: The sneaky Lizard poisoned your Spock! You lose!
spock.paper: Spock was disproved by the Paper! You lose!

lizard.spock: Your Lizard used Poison! It was super effective! Spock fainted.  You win!
lizard.paper: Your Lizard ate the Paper! You win!
lizard.rock: Your Lizard was squished by the Rock! You lose!
lizard.scissors: Your lizard was decapitated by the Scissors! Ouch! You lose!

grandwinner.win: Congratulations! You won the championship! You're the grand winner!
grandwinner.lose: Ahw, shucks! You lost the championship to a computer!

menu.greeting: Welcome to Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock!
menu.contents: Please select one of the following:
menu.instructions1:
R-P-S-L-SP combines Rock Paper Scissors with the rule of 5!
=> Introducing two new combatants in the form of Spock and Lizard
menu.instructions2:
Rock beats Scissors and Lizard.
=> Paper beats Rock and Spock.
=> Scissors beats Lizard and Paper.
=> Spock beats Scissors and Rock.
=> Lizard beats Spock and Paper.
menu.instructions3:
The game continues until someone wins best out of five!
=> Can you become the new R-P-S-L-SP grand winner?
